title: Congratulations! You are hired as the project manager. In this row you will learn the relevant part of the story of the particular space.
story: Congratulations! You are hired as the project manager. In this row you will learn the relevant part of the story of the particular space.
action_description: This row will summarise the actions that may need to be done to progress the game.
outcome_description: And this row is items chosen by chance… but not always because you can reject lady luck and NEGOTIATE.
can_negotiate: and if you really realy realy do not like your choices... Sometimes you can refuse them and just try again.

title: Now that you read the first column and know the rules - here is your strategy guide:
story: Now that you read the first column and know the rules - here is your strategy guide:
action_description: You just got hired by an owner. The 2 of you will dream up / design / review and build a project.
outcome_description: Strategise and pick the right dice rolls
can_negotiate: Don't forget waiting 1 extra turn if the roll is really bad may be more advantageous.

title: The owner dreams up an idea of project scope.
story: The owner dreams up an idea of project scope.
action_description: You as PM can review their scope and either accept it or negotiate by repeating the roll next turn.

title: You changed the owner's mind.
story: You changed the owner's mind.
action_description: This roll will determine your path.

title: Owner does some number crunching and comes up with their share of money.
story: Owner does some number crunching and comes up with their share of money.
action_description: You look at the scope estimates and the money owner gave you. You can take it or waste time and hope to renegotiate next turn.

title: Owner is quite upset and comes up with a new number.
story: Owner is quite upset and comes up with a new number.
action_description: You look at the scope estimates and the money owner gave you and laugh… but leave the room.

title: As project manager your first decision is to determine the direction of project.
story: As project manager your first decision is to determine the direction of project.
action_description: You and expeditor strategize and come up with some changes. Life happens and you choose a path forward.

title: You are a thinker and need to reasses the situation. What will you do next?
story: You are a thinker and need to reasses the situation. What will you do next?
action_description: Your staff sees an oportunity at the competition and leaves you. Meanwhile life passes you by and you finally decide what to do next.

title: You need more money! - The lender reviews the business plan and negotiates scope for a better rate.
story: You need more money! - The lender reviews the business plan and negotiates scope for a better rate.
action_description: Scope negotiations last a while as life pases you by. Your expeditor comes up with an idea and the deal is struck!

title: Burning through the pile of cash is easier than you thought… Time to get som fresh dough.
story: Burning through the pile of cash is easier than you thought… Time to get som fresh dough.
action_description: More money = more staff scope and life changes.

title: You wait patiently as the bank underwrites to determine the loan amount and rate.
story: You wait patiently as the bank underwrites to determine the loan amount and rate.
action_description: Having money will alow you to hire and and spend maybe even have a life.

title: You wait impatiently as the bank underwrites to determine the loan amount and rate.
story: You wait impatiently as the bank underwrites to determine the loan amount and rate.
action_description: It is late in the game - you are starting to loose credibility. Staff is leaving. Life is passing you by.

title: You wait patiently as the investors determine the loan amount and rate.
story: You wait patiently as the investors determine the loan amount and rate.
action_description: Having money will alow you to hire and and spend maybe even have a life.

title: You wait impatiently as the investors determine the loan amount and rate.
story: You wait impatiently as the investors determine the loan amount and rate.
action_description: It is late in the game - you are starting to loose credibility. Staff is leaving. Life is passing you by.

title: You are searching for the architect.
story: You are searching for the architect.
action_description: You are making phone calls and looking at qualifications… in the mean time others play…as you roll for outside influence only.

title: Architect glances over files to determine if change to drawings is needed.
story: Architect glances over files to determine if change to drawings is needed.
action_description: As time ticks you think: Looks bad you may have to redesign again!

title: Architect negotiates their initial fees.
story: Architect negotiates their initial fees.
action_description: Everyone wants money from you! You paid a big chunk so now you have to save a little by cutting your staff.

title: Architect negotiates additional architect fees.
story: Architect negotiates additional architect fees.
action_description: You cross your fingers and wait for life to dump on you. You will need a friend in need.

title: Architect 's team finished their design. Today you are attending the final presentation.
story: Architect 's team finished their design. Today you are attending the final presentation.
action_description: The architect takes their time to get to the initial design scope determination.

title: Architect subsequent design review determination.
story: Architect subsequent design review determination.
action_description: Roll for outcome.

title: You are searching for the engineer.
story: You are searching for the engineer.
action_description: More phone calls and qualification reviews… in the mean time others play…as you roll for outside influence card.

title: Engineer glances over files to determine if change to drawings is needed.
story: Engineer glances over files to determine if change to drawings is needed.
action_description: You try to read the engineers lips before he tells you your path.

title: Engineer negotiates their initial fees.
story: Engineer negotiates their initial fees.
action_description: Every penny counts - you get your best man involved.

title: Engineer negotiates additional architect fees.
story: Engineer negotiates additional architect fees.
action_description: How do we make this sound like it is included in the original fee?

title: Engineer's team finished their design. Time for another final presentation.
story: Engineer's team finished their design. Time for another final presentation.
action_description: I am not building a rocket ship. Why is this taking so long? What will the design be?

title: Engineer subsequent design review determination.
story: Engineer subsequent design review determination.
action_description: The roll of drawings you got does not look any different. You wonder if there are changes.

title: Some decisions require owners input. Especially when owner wants it THEIR WAY.
story: Some decisions require owners input. Especially when owner wants it THEIR WAY.
action_description: The owners ponder and tell you their plans.

title: It has been a while since last review. Time is running out and owner just wants to see the finish line.
story: It has been a while since last review. Time is running out and owner just wants to see the finish line.
action_description: Impatintly the owners hear you out and come to a quick decision.

title: Let's get this shit done at any cost! they said… So you are looking to cut a few days off the top.
story: Let's get this shit done at any cost! they said… So you are looking to cut a few days off the top.
action_description: You are nervous - the odds are not in your favor.

title: Cheating last time did not go so well. You still want to try but are a lot more carefull.
story: Cheating last time did not go so well. You still want to try but are a lot more carefull.
action_description: Review path and fees are determined by 1 dice roll.

title: Owner pays DOB fees.
story: Owner pays DOB fees.
action_description: Fork over the cash…And hire a few staff.

title: Determine if additional fees are due to Department of Buildings.
story: Determine if additional fees are due to Department of Buildings.
action_description: hope not to fork over more cash…And replace staff.

title: Project manager chooses (slow and low risk) or (fast and high risk) path at DOB.
story: Project manager chooses (slow and low risk) or (fast and high risk) path at DOB.
action_description: You have a choice to say Plan Exam (slow) or Prof Cert (fast).

title: Waiting tor Clerks to process files or for appointment.
story: Waiting tor Clerks to process files or for appointment.
action_description: Hurry Up and Wait…

title: Plan examiner takes time to do first review.
story: Plan examiner takes time to do first review.
action_description: You try to sound like you knw the code and wait for their determination.

title: Plan examiner rushes through the review.
story: Plan examiner rushes through the review.
action_description: You stay qiuet and only speak when spoken to - which stamp will he use approval or denial?

title: DOB Clerk almost notices your existance while processing your papaerwork.
story: DOB Clerk almost notices your existance while processing your papaerwork.
action_description: You chew your gum intently hoping no errors are done in data entry.

title: DOB Clerk greets you by saying -You again?- and processes your paper work
story: DOB Clerk greets you by saying -You again?- and processes your paper work
action_description: You hope that this time the expeditor filled out the forms correctly… after all you paid almost a grand.

title: Nerdy auditor cites from memory ZR-23.5 while auditing your application.
story: Nerdy auditor cites from memory ZR-23.5 while auditing your application.
action_description: You got home after a long day at Department of Buildings and you find that your job was audited - where did we go wrong?

title: Auditor notices the number of objections fixed and continues with audit.
story: Auditor notices the number of objections fixed and continues with audit.
action_description: We almost had it and now it is down to the last few objections. Will they pass?

title: FDNY Clerk checks to see if job review needs to be done.
story: FDNY Clerk checks to see if job review needs to be done.
action_description: You have to answer a maze of questions to get out of gere.

title: FDNY Clerk checks to see if job review needs to be done.
story: FDNY Clerk checks to see if job review needs to be done.
action_description: Assess 4 criteria.

title: Plan examiner takes time to do first review.
story: Plan examiner takes time to do first review.
action_description: You try to sound like you know the code and wait for their determination.

title: Plan examiner rushes through the review.
story: Plan examiner rushes through the review.
action_description: You stay qiuet and only speak when spoken to - which stamp will he use approval or denial?

title: The contractor has to be chosen to finaly make your dreams come true.
story: The contractor has to be chosen to finaly make your dreams come true.
action_description: You roll 2 times (1st quality of Contractor) (2nd multiplier) and than you do a lot of math.

title: Project Manager negotiates a change order.
story: Project Manager negotiates a change order.
action_description: Now we negotiate time extension.

title: Construction many time unearths unforseen issues in the field.
story: Construction many time unearths unforseen issues in the field.
action_description: You attempt to resolve everything on the spot because delays are expensive.

title: Problems never stop at a construction site - but every day counts.
story: Problems never stop at a construction site - but every day counts.
action_description: Once again you try to prevent issues. No time for delays.

title: That inspector looks fresh this is eiter good or bad news.
story: That inspector looks fresh this is eiter good or bad news.
action_description: You notice a safety violation and distract the inspector making him look the other way - will it work?

title: Inspector Johnes never liked you; but at least he tries to be fair.
story: Inspector Johnes never liked you; but at least he tries to be fair.
action_description: Luckily the Frank's team just finished in time for this inspection. You think it should be smooth saling.

title: The clerks are having a bitrtday party. Everything is delayed an hour
story: The clerks are having a bitrtday party. Everything is delayed an hour
action_description: At least the clerks will be happy - you think when you hand in the final files.

title: the supervisor is consoling one of the clerks - everything is slow again.
story: the supervisor is consoling one of the clerks - everything is slow again.
action_description: Worst part is everyone seems in bad mood. Will they notice the photocopy instead of original?

title: You Completed project!
story: You Completed project!
action_description: YOU ARE done! Calculate final score.

title: You Completed project!
story: You Completed project!
action_description: YOU ARE done! Calculate final score.
